casebody.data:
LUBRIZOL ADVANCED MATERIALS, INC.
v.
NATL. UNION FIRE INS. CO. OF PITTSBURGH 2018-1815 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 17, 2019

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On petitioner's motion to transmit the record. Motion granted. The clerk of the United States District Court for the Northern District of Ohio shall transmit a copy of the record in case No. 17-CV-01782-DAP within 14 days.
